about_the_game:
Dimon, brutal freelancer and all-time pervert, is now working as a witch assistant after the previous one disappeared due to mysterious circumstances…

He'll have to perform many duties in order to keep his job at the witch's atelier and survive the many dangers that come with it; while getting to know his new mistress and the vast world of witchcraft.

However, his true objective is to have fun with (or punish) any woman he come across, but not before taking photos of them to push them into a corner.​

Will he come out on top, scot free? Is he completely irredeemable? "And little does everyone know about his twisted plan."

Study your targets/prey: Is she hot? What’s her weakness? Does she deserve it? Choose who to spend time with in order to learn more about your prey. Any piece of information will be crucial to reach your objective. They won’t see it coming! Hopefully you won’t have to deal with their problems.

Take photos: The next step is to take compromising photos without their knowledge. Boobs, ass, thighs or maybe during a more private time? But not only dirty photos, remember, in this line of work you have to be flexible. What will you get?

Blackmail: Those photos aren’t only for show! With enough dirt it will be time to show your true colors and push them into a corner. This is a rapist principle, is what separates a man from an animal. Make sure you have enough material, or else…

Enjoy: With no other choice, they’ll be yours to do as you like. Choose who and how to fuck, with many options available, whether they like it or not.

The way of the Assistant: But before all that, first, you’ll have many duties to attend to, such as looking for alchemy ingredients or selling products to potential clients to reach the month’s quota. A drag for sure, but this inconvenience is nothing but a stepping stone to your goal.

The business’ fate: As time goes on the atelier will face many challenges. Will someone as Dimon overcome them?

content_descriptors.notes:
Dimon Witch's Pervert contains the following content:
-Risque outfits, sexual comments and adult situations
-Sex Scenes (Blowjobs, consensual sex, public nudity and sex with fantasy characters. 
-Non consensual sex. Blackmail and Voyeurism
-Sex with anthro/furry characters
-All characters in Dimon Witch's Pervert are 18+ and over

name: Dimon - The Witch's Pervert Assistant

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Any Dual-Core Processor (Intel or AMD)
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
